item.title: 亚马逊将仓库工人时薪至少提高 1.50 美元
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）正在将其仓库小时工的工资每小时至少提高 1.50 美元，并在他们的福利待遇中增加 Prime 会员资格。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is raising the pay of its hourly warehouse workers by at least $1.50 an hour and tacking on Prime memberships to their benefit package.】

item.title: 对冲基金回避巴西贸易 赢得华尔街拥趸
item.description: 华尔街一些最大的银行正在告诉客户看好巴西，呼吁结束今年困扰当地市场的萎靡不振。【原文：Some of Wall Street’s biggest banks are telling clients to place bullish bets on Brazil, calling an end to the malaise that has plagued local markets this year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚努力解决住房危机，因为政客们取消了
item.description: 澳大利亚解决住房危机的最新尝试陷入了政治僵局，因为该国的可用租赁面积徘徊在历史最低点附近。【原文：Australia’s latest attempts to solve its housing crisis are stuck in political gridlock as the amount of available rental space in the nation hovers near a record low.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会准备就股票定价和交易所费用改革进行表决
item.description: 本周三，美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）将对最终规则进行投票表决，将数千种股票和交易所交易基金（ETF）的报价增量降至 1 美分以下。【原文：The price increments at which thousands of stocks and ETFs are quoted look set for an overhaul Wednesday, when the US Securities and Exchange Commission votes on final rules to reduce them to less than 1 cent.】

item.title: Costanoa Ventures 逆势融资 3.94 亿美元
item.description: Costanoa Ventures 为两只新基金募集了 3.94 亿美元的资金，而此时许多中小型风险投资公司正在为引进新资金而苦苦挣扎。【原文：Costanoa Ventures has raised $394 million for two new funds, financing that comes at a time when many small and midsized venture firms are struggling to bring in fresh capital.】

item.title: 暴雪联合创始人的新公司 Dreamhaven 旨在重现昔日魔力
item.description:
这家游戏新贵正在发行一款由 Fuzzybot  开发的多人动作游戏，并将于 10 月份宣布其首款内部开发的游戏

。【原文：

The gaming upstart is publishing a multiplayer action game from Fuzzybot and will announce its first internally developed title in October

】

item.title: 人工智能改变角色，货币交易员正在成为 "算法 DJ
item.description: 算法交易正在从根本上改变货币交易商的角色，导致他们质疑谁将对日益依赖计算机模型的交易负责。【原文：Algorithmic trading is radically changing the role of currency dealers, leading them to question who will be responsible for the growing reliance on computer models.】

item.title: 德国启动原材料基金以加强供应链
item.description: 德国政府正在启动一项 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的原材料投资基金，以限制对中国等重要矿产生产国的依赖。【原文：The German government is launching a €1 billion ($1.1 billion) fund for investment in raw materials as it seeks to limit dependency on producers such as China for critical minerals.】

item.title: 必和必拓化肥老板押宝低成本钾肥挑战对手
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）项目负责人表示，即使化肥价格疲软，该公司预计其价值 106 亿美元的加拿大钾盐矿也能赚钱。【原文：BHP Group expects its $10.6 billion potash mine in Canada to make money even with weakened fertilizer prices, says the head of the project.】

item.title: 罗杰斯以 35 亿美元收购 BCE 在枫叶体育公司的股份
item.description: 罗杰斯通信公司（Rogers Communications Inc. ）将以 47 亿加元（35 亿美元）的价格收购 BCE 公司在枫叶体育娱乐有限公司（Maple Leaf Sports & Entertainment Ltd. ）37.5% 的股份，从而使这家电信巨头获得这家体育公司的多数股权，该公司最有价值的资产包括多伦多枫叶冰球俱乐部和多伦多猛龙队。【原文：Rogers Communications Inc. is buying BCE Inc.’s 37.5% stake in Maple Leaf Sports & Entertainment Ltd. for C$4.7 billion ($3.5 billion), giving the telecommunications giant a majority stake in the sports company whose most valuable assets include the Toronto Maple Leafs hockey club and the Toronto Raptors.】

item.title: 大众汽车与中国合作伙伴上汽集团因销量萎缩将关闭汽车工厂
item.description: 大众汽车公司及其最古老的中国合作伙伴计划关闭在中国的一家工厂，并可能关闭更多工厂，以应对内燃机汽车需求的放缓。【原文：Volkswagen AG and its oldest Chinese partner plan to shutter one plant in China and possibly more in response to slowing demand for combustion-engine cars, in a further pullback after the venture’s first factory ceased output.】

item.title: 新聊天机器人 ETF 承诺模仿沃伦-巴菲特和大卫-泰珀
item.description: 这可能是华尔街利用新式人工智能工具模仿金融传奇的最大胆的尝试。【原文：It might just be the most audacious bid on Wall Street to exploit newfangled AI tools to mimic the legends of finance.】

item.title: 滚出加拿大多伦多证券交易所反弹后一些策略师转入防御
item.description: 自加拿大央行 6 月份开始降息以来，加拿大主要股指已飙升近 8%，表现优于 S&P 500 指数。一些策略师说，这是一个机会—；他们敦促投资者抛售，甚至完全退出加拿大股票。【原文：Canada’s main stock index has surged almost 8% since its central bank began cutting interest rates in June, outperforming the S&P 500. Some strategists say that’s an opportunity — they’re urging investors to sell down or even get out of Canadian stocks altogether.】

item.title: 如何让 Uber 和 Lyft 乘客负担得起并让司机满意？
item.description: 由于缺乏针对应用程序司机的联邦立法，美国各城市和各州都变成了 "打工经济 "的战场。有没有更好的办法？【原文：In the absence of federal legislation for app-based drivers, US cities and states have turned into gig-economy battlegrounds. Is there a better way?】

item.title: 美联储准备放宽政策，抵押贷款市场的历史性波动趋于平缓
item.description: 当美联储改变利率时，8 万亿美元的抵押贷款市场可能会引发整个固定收益市场的大幅波动，但投资者们说这次不同。【原文：The $8 trillion mortgage market can trigger big swings across fixed income when the Federal Reserve shifts interest rates, but investors say this time is different.】

item.title: 花旗家族办公室客户缩减现金堆以进行更高风险的投资
item.description: 花旗集团的家族办公室客户正在减少现金持有量，转而投资于风险较高的资产类别，这反映出他们对金融市场的前景越来越乐观。【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s family office clients are reducing their cash holdings to make investments in riskier asset classes, reflecting their increasingly optimistic outlook on financial markets.】

item.title: 油砂之乡的碳价疲软将减缓气候收益
item.description: 加拿大阿尔伯塔省的碳信用额价格下跌，有可能拖累该国最大的温室气体排放源--石油工业的减排工作。【原文：Falling prices for carbon credits in the Canadian province of Alberta are threatening to become a drag on efforts to slash emissions from the oil industry, the country’s top source of greenhouse gases.】

item.title: CVC输给DSV后，愿意提高140亿欧元的全球国际货运出价
item.description: 在输给丹麦公司 DSV A/S 后，CVC Capital Partners Plc 表示愿意提高其对德国铁路公司物流部门 140 亿欧元（156 亿美元）的收购报价。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc signaled it’s willing to increase its €14 billion ($15.6 billion) offer for Deutsche Bahn AG’s logistics unit after losing the bidding to Danish company DSV A/S.】

item.title: 保罗-陶布曼（Paul Taubman）的 PJT 收购 DeNovo，借中东交易热潮套现
item.description: PJT Partners 同意收购总部位于迪拜的咨询公司 deNovo Partners，在中东地区交易活动激增的背景下，保罗-陶布曼（Paul Taubman）的投资银行在中东地区获得了更大的立足点。【原文：PJT Partners agreed to acquire Dubai-based advisory firm deNovo Partners, giving Paul Taubman’s investment bank a greater foothold in the Middle East amid a surge in regional dealmaking activity.】

item.title: 韩国榜样的声誉在 Kakao 案中受到威胁
item.description: 韩剧以其富丽堂皇、魅力四射、情节曲折、秘密严密而风靡全球。上周，首尔就出现了不少这样的元素。但首先...【原文：Korean dramas have become popular the world over with their captivating mix of opulent wealth and glamor, plot twists and tightly-held secrets. More than a few of those elements showed up in Seoul this past week. But first...】

item.title: 清理发展中国家的电网是一项艰巨的任务
item.description:
印度是较贫穷国家在实现更多可再生能源上网方面所面临障碍的典型代表。【原文：

India is emblematic of the hurdles poorer nations face in getting more renewables online.

】

item.title: 巴斯夫将在大修中宣布农用化学品上市计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，巴斯夫（BASF SE）的新领导人正准备在本月晚些时候宣布一系列改革措施，包括对其农用化学品和涂料业务未来的规划。【原文：BASF SE’s new leader is gearing up to announce a series of overhaul measures later this month, including plans for the future of its agricultural chemicals and coatings businesses, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行必须保持耐心才能完全实现 2% 的物价目标
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）说，欧洲中央银行在降低通胀方面取得了良好进展，但要完全达到 2% 的目标还需要耐心。【原文：The European Central Bank has made good progress in bringing inflation down, but needs patience to fully reach the 2% target, Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said.】

item.title: 价格下跌抵消流量增加，俄罗斯石油公司盈利下滑
item.description:
自6月底以来，俄罗斯原油出口价值已暴跌近30%

。【原文：

The value of Russia’s crude exports has plunged by almost 30% since the end of June

】

item.title: 美联储降息前美国抵押贷款利率降至两年低点
item.description: 由于预期美联储将降息，上周美国抵押贷款利率降至 2022 年 9 月以来的最低水平，这刺激了购房和再融资申请的大量涌入。【原文：US mortgage rates declined last week to the lowest level since September 2022 in anticipation of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts, stoking an influx of applications for home purchases and refinancing.】

item.title: 前 Coinbase 员工推出专注于稳定币的加密货币交易所
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc.的两名前高级雇员正在推出一个名为 TrueX 的加密货币平台，该平台将使用贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.【原文：Two former high level Coinbase Global Inc. employees are launching a cryptocurrency platform called TrueX that will use PayPal Holdings Inc.’s stablecoin as its preferred token for transactions.】

item.title: TechInsights 称，YMTC 利用中国工具推进芯片技术发展
item.description: 根据 TechInsights 的最新研究，中国扬子江存储科技股份有限公司（Yangtze Memory Technologies Co.【原文：China’s Yangtze Memory Technologies Co. has made progress in replacing foreign chipmaking technology with homegrown alternatives and its latest storage products now rival global market leaders, according to new research from TechInsights.】

item.title: 银行准备忘却洪灾之痛，大举收购融资
item.description: 两年前，华尔街银行支持大型企业收购，结果背上了数百亿美元的 "悬债"，难以脱身。现在，他们又卷土重来。【原文：Wall Street banks were burned two years ago when they backed big corporate buyouts and ended up with tens of billions of dollars of “hung debt” they struggled to get rid of. Now they’re back for more.】

item.title: 尽管增长前景不明，杰尼亚首席执行官仍对中国充满信心
item.description: 在纽约上市的意大利时装公司杰尼亚（Ermenegildo Zegna），尽管经济复苏的时机尚不明朗，但仍坚持其在中国的中期扩张计划。【原文：Ermenegildo Zegna, the Italian fashion house listed in New York, is sticking with its expansion plans for China over the medium term despite uncertain timing on a possible economic recovery.】

item.title: 甲骨文人工智能驱动的增长令华尔街多年来最为看好
item.description: 甲骨文公司正在赢得投资者和分析师的青睐，因为它看到了人工智能需求推动的销售增长复苏。【原文：Oracle Corp. is winning over investors and analysts as it sees a resurgence in sales growth driven by artificial intelligence-fueled demand.】
